news.title: Samsung taking market share from Apple in U.S. as foldable phones gain momentum
news.summary: Samsung introduced two folding phones in July that are garnering praise on social media. Samsung is putting pressure on Apple to deliver new types of iPhones.

news.title: Bill Gates meets Willy Wonka: How Epic's 82-year-old billionaire CEO, Judy Faulkner, built her software factory
news.summary: Judy Faulkner has run Epic Systems for 46 years. She has a detailed plan for what happens when she's no longer the boss.

news.title: Trump warned by top Senate Democrats to rethink advanced AI chip sales to China
news.summary: Top Senate Democrats warned Trump about AI chip deal with China in an open letter in August. On Aug. 15, top Senate Democrats sent a letter to the president warning him about the deal.

news.title: U.S. delegation's India visit reportedly called off as trade tensions simmer
news.summary: The visit that was expected to take place between Aug. 25 and Aug. 29 will likely be rescheduled, NDTV reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

news.title: I’m a couples therapist — here are 5 reasons why people risk everything for an affair
news.summary: There are five surprisingly common psychological pitfalls that can make someone risk everything for an affair, according to a couples therapist. There are five Surprisingly common Psychological pitfalls that Can make Someone Risk Everything for an Affair.

news.title: Teachers spending big on classroom supplies can look forward to broader tax breaks — but there’s a catch
news.summary: The IRS already offers a educator expense deduction. Here's what's next for the tax code. The next step will be to change the definition of what constitutes an educator expense.

news.title: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?
news.summary: “We have retired from full-time work,” says the couple. “We’re not going to do it anymore.” “It’s time to go home.’

news.title: ‘I am a senior citizen’: My car needs $3,500 for repairs, but only has a trade-in value of $6,000. Do I bother fixing it?
news.summary: What is the ‘tipping point’ for keeping one’s old car versus trading it in?” asks CNN iReport.

news.title: My aunt barely spends any money. Will we receive the contents of her safe-deposit box when she dies?
news.summary: “I am asking for my mom, who is on a fixed income. It would be a nice boon,” she says.

news.title: 3 ways to make sure the ‘great wealth transfer’ enriches your family
news.summary: From ‘affluenza’ to abundance: How to teach heirs to value their privilege — and your money. How do you teach your children to appreciate their privilege and their money?
